Hello! I am Joel.

I am a frontend developer at creative advertising agency Dare based in central London. Although I focus in frontend development, I dabble with any technologies I can get my hands on. I have worked on all kinds of projects such as large-scale websites, phonegap applications, and iAds to name a few.

When I am trying to learn new things, you might see it appear on my Github. I also ramble about my experiments and food on Twitter as well. If you would like to get in touch with me directly, send me an email.

Here are some of the projects I have worked on:

  • Sainsbury's Inspiration

    Some copy about the Sainsbury’s Inspiration site…… vist site.

    Visit site

  • Barclays Life Skills

    Last year in spring, Barclays released a new initive called Life Skills. Barclays wanted to help teenagers gain vitial skills in a varity of areas such as investing, education, and careers. I was the tech lead for the interactive modules that taught users the skills they needed.

    Visit site

    The Become Electric site had a range of modules that were put live over a period of time till the BMW i3 luanch.

  • Post Office Website

    In the summer of 2012, the Post Office released their new rebrand, to which I had worked on the front end of their new site.
